Academics Home / Explore Programs / Technology and Engineering Education

Technology and Engineering Education

Degree

BS in Technology and Engineering Education

Schools

EducationEngineering

Department

Integrative STEM Education

At a Glance

With technology and engineering affecting every aspect of individual life, society, and the environment, you can make a tremendous impact by teaching curious learners in middle and upper grades. In this integrative STEM-based program, you’ll gain the skills, knowledge, and experience to become a highly effective technology and engineering teacher. Emphasis is placed on understanding core STEM principles and applying design-centric, problem-based pedagogies.

ApplyRequest Info

Undergraduate Program Options

MAJOR

Technology and Engineering Education, BS

MINOR

Technology Minor

You’ll Benefit From:

  • Small classes and seminars with guidance from dedicated faculty
  • Design thinking and hands-on learning
  • Opportunities to participate in faculty-mentored research
  • A flexible curriculum that accommodates the option of minors
  • On-campus employment options
  • Participation in active student groups and organizations
  • The potential to pursue an accelerated bachelor’s to master’s degree in integrative STEM education
  • Preparation and mentoring for graduate and professional programs

Teaching Careers

The technology and engineering education degree offers deep preparation for teaching middle and high school grades and qualifies educators for New Jersey certification in grades K–12. You can also qualify for endorsements in computer science, engineering technology, and technology education.

It’s also worth noting that technology and engineering teachers boast some of the highest starting salaries among education graduates in New Jersey. Recent graduates have had a 100% placement rate in jobs or graduate school programs within six months of graduation.

Recent Employers

Fair Lawn Public School District
Hillsborough Township Public School District
Hopewell Valley Regional School District
Northern Burlington County Regional School District

West Windsor-Plainsboro Regional School District

Recent Graduate Schools

Columbia University
Purdue University
The College of New Jersey
Virginia Tech

Experiential Learning

This program integrates liberal arts study, education theory and practice, and extensive fieldwork — including a semester of supervised classroom teaching. Students receive guidance from faculty advisors, ensuring excellent support throughout their studies.

State-of-the-Art Facilities

At TCNJ, students have access to and exposure to cutting-edge equipment and dedicated specialty laboratories. Hands-on labs empower you to apply skills and confirm theoretical principles learned in the classroom. Recent multimillion-dollar investments ensure students learn in modern facilities with advanced instrumentation and state-of-the-art design, prototyping, and validation tools.

Faculty

Our accomplished integrative STEM faculty are dedicated instructors and mentors. Get an inside track on innovative research from faculty collaborating across academia and industry.

An Extensive Network

Study alongside talented peers, learn from faculty with valuable contacts in their field, and benefit from an alumni community with strong professional connections and genuine enthusiasm for supporting students.
